lead_paragraph: Congress passed a $619 billion military policy bill that includes a measure adding 1,500 visas for Afghans who have risked their lives as interpreters and translators.

headline.print_headline: Visa Program Renewed for Afghan Translators, With New Restrictions
headline.main: Visa Program for Afghan Translators Is Renewed, With New Restrictions

snippet: Congress passed a $619 billion military policy bill that includes a measure adding 1,500 visas for Afghans who have risked their lives as interpreters and translators....
abstract: Congress renews visa program offering sanctuary to Afghans who face serious threats for having assisted American troops as interpreters and translators; 1,500 extra visas are added to program, only covering fraction of 13,000 pending applications, and new eligibility restrictions are imposed.
